Class ApplicationService

Object
ApplicationService
public class ApplicationService extends Object
Service class for managing internship applications Handles application submissions, reviews, acceptances, and withdrawals

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationService

      public ApplicationService(IRepository systemRepository)
      Constructs the application service with required dependencies.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public Application apply(String studentId, String internshipId) throws MaxExceedException, UserNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
      Student applies for an internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      internshipId - the ID of the internship opportunity
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if its invalid student id
      IllegalStateException - if the student applied for the internship already
      MaxExceedException - if student exceed their max allowed applications
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(String studentId)
      Parameters:
      studentId - student ID
      Returns:
      student object corresponding to the Id

    • acceptApplication

      public void acceptApplication(String studentId, String applicationId) throws ObjectNotFoundException
      Student accepts an approved application. This will automatically withdraw all other pending or approved applications of the student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      applicationId - the ID of the application to accept
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the application ID is invalid
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to the student

    • reviewApplication

      public void reviewApplication(String appId, boolean approve) throws ObjectNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
      Reviews an application submitted to an internship opportunity for approval or rejection.
      Parameters:
      appId - the ID of the application to review
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if the application ID is invalid
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to this representative
      IllegalStateException - if the application has already been reviewed
      IllegalArgumentException

    • findApplication

      public Application findApplication(String applicationId)
      finds application object and returns it
      Parameters:
      applicationId - application id
      Returns:
      Application object

    • validStatusTransition

      public boolean validStatusTransition(ApplicationStatus current, ApplicationStatus next)
      Helper method to validate status transitions.
      Parameters:
      current - the current status
      next - the desired new status
      Returns:
      true if the transition is valid, false otherwise

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(Application application)
      Parameters:
      application - application object added the student application list
